resources.string:
WePOSE, an android application, is implemented to receive data from sensor network via WIFI for real-time sensor data processing, data logging, and instantaneous feedback.

 Wearable Posture Body Detection and Monitoring via Mobile App Visualization and Analysis project is a wearable technology solution designed to automatically monitor a user’s posture position for sitting through the use of a non-invasive wearable system and automatically provide algorithm feedback to alert the user in case of an unhealthy postural situations, such as sitting with a hunchback, to improve posture habits and prevent posture-related health problems.

 The project involves the development of a wearable posture body detection and monitoring system using Arduino which consists of IMU sensor to capture and analyze the user’s body movement and orientation. A vibration from phone is used to generate vibration feedback to acquire the user’s awareness of their own posture.

01. Setup WIFI Connection
 02. Wear the device at the body's back
 03. Turn on the device
 04. Initialization (first-time user only)
 05. Start/Stop Activity in app
\nFirst-time user has to do initialization setup for one minute to record the position of their good sitting posture before they can proceed for monitoring of bad posture.
